mapper.sql: SELECT a.m_no AS mno, a.a_no AS ano, m.m_id AS id, g.g_nick AS nick, m.m_name AS name, m.m_sex AS sex, TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) - TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(m.m_birth, 'YYYY'))+1 AS age, m.m_loc AS loc, a.a_interest AS interest, a.a_apdate AS adate, a.a_tel AS tel, m.m_email AS email, a.a_cond AS thisStep, a.a_pic AS pic, ac.acount AS acount, NVL(gc.gcount, 0) AS gcount FROM TB_Member m, TB_Apply a, TB_Guest g, (SELECT COUNT(a_no) AS acount, m_no FROM TB_Apply GROUP BY m_no) ac, (SELECT COUNT(gg.g_no) AS gcount, gg.m_no FROM (SELECT a.m_no, g.g_no FROM TB_Apply a, TB_Guest g WHERE a.a_no=g.a_no) gg GROUP BY gg.m_no) gc WHERE m.m_no = a.m_no AND a.a_no = g.a_no(+) AND ac.m_no = a.m_no AND gc.m_no(+) = a.m_no AND a.e_eventdate = #{edate} AND

SELECT e_eventdate AS evdate, e_gisoo AS gisoo, e_title AS etitle, waitCount, manCount, womanCount, deniedCount FROM TB_Event, (SELECT COUNT(a_no) AS waitCount FROM TB_Apply WHERE e_eventdate = #{edate} AND a_cond=1) wc, (SELECT COUNT(a.a_no) AS manCount FROM TB_Apply a, TB_Member m WHERE a.e_eventdate = #{edate} AND a_cond IN (2, 3, 4, 8, 9, 10) AND a.m_no=m.m_no AND m.m_sex='M') mc, (SELECT COUNT(a.a_no) AS womanCount FROM TB_Apply a, TB_Member m WHERE a.e_eventdate = #{edate} AND a_cond IN (2, 3, 4, 8, 9, 10) AND a.m_no=m.m_no AND m.m_sex='F') fc, (SELECT COUNT(a_no) AS deniedCount FROM TB_Apply WHERE e_eventdate = #{edate} AND a_cond IN (5, 6 ,7)) dc WHERE e_eventdate = #{edate}
